eightball: Oh, no butts about it. Definitely!
Maybe? I wouldn't know, would I?
What a strange question to ask a bum! Surely others would me more capable to answer that?
Jeesh. That's a tough one - let me think about that for a bit, okay?
Ha! Not in a million years. Not even if the stars align.
I think so! Just a bum's hunch, though.
Er, that's not really my area of expertise...
Who knows? I like to think so!
Of all the questions you could ask me - ALL OF THEM - you ask that?
Just maybe. A bum can dream, right?
Oh god no. Just the thought of it.
Ha, yes! Absolutely! What, you'd say otherwise?
